title: Mayer slams 'illusion of democracy' as Ben Sulayem will face no opponents in FIA election
summary: Neither of Ben Sulayem's opponents have been able to meet the new requirements introduced by the FIA president earlier this year

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current president of the FIA?
What organization does Mohammed Ben Sulayem lead?
What is a recent requirement introduced by the FIA president for election candidates?
